body:
On 29 January 2015 at 22:37, Dmitry Vyukov <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> http://golang.org/project page has "Check out the Go source code" link
> which leads to incomprehensible page with no obvious way to checkout code
> (I still did not found it there).


The third line on that page says

> git clone https://go.googlesource.com/go
